pr_title: [HUDI-1474] Add additional unit tests to TestHBaseIndex

timeline.message: [HUDI-1474] Add additional unit tests to TestHBaseIndex

timeline.bodyText: sorry, shouldn't this return 0 since the commit is rolled back? I see a test in this class testSimpleTagLocationAndUpdateWithRollback which tests that rolledback records don't have current location set. am I missing something?
timeline.author: nsivabalan

replies.bodyText:
These tests are added mainly to validate checkIfValidCommit() is using the completed commit timeline (older version of this function was not using the timeline with all instants, causing dupes).
When the rolled back commit is older than the earliest available commit, then it is treated as an archived commit.
replies.author: nbalajee
